amendment.description: Amendment sought to prevent the EPA from using funds to change ozone regulations whether or not all counties meet the 2008 standards.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to remove the requirement that 85 percent of nonattainment counties must achieve full compliance with the ozone standard before the limitation on funds in section 438 can take effect.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Yoho amendment (A042) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Yoho amendment (A042) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A042) offered by Mr. Yoho.
